function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underestimation of park visitation due to repeated data from the same user","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of the demographic characteristics of park visitors","Mitigation":"Implement data de-duplication processes to remove repeated visitation data","Technologies":"Data analytics and de-duplication algorithms","People":"Park management, data analysts","Owner":"Park management, data analytics team"},{"Description":"Less availability of cell phone location data in socially vulnerable communities","Impact":"Underestimation of park visitation in socially vulnerable neighborhoods","Mitigation":"Implement alternative data collection methods in socially vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Community engagement, alternative data collection technologies","People":"Community leaders, data collection teams","Owner":"Community leaders, data collection teams"},{"Description":"Negative impact of numerous smaller parks on park visitation during COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased park visits in urban census tracts with more parks","Mitigation":"Improve the quality and appeal of smaller parks, promote physical distancing measures","Technologies":"Park design improvements, marketing and promotion strategies","People":"Park management, urban planners","Owner":"Park management, municipal authorities"}]}
